Ad.AlternateText: Need cells cultured and treated to your specifications? Try our custom cell preparation services.
Want to identify kinase substrates, their phosphosites and detection antibodies? Try our unique Custom Kinase-Substrate Profiling Services.
Need to inexpensively test the specificity of your kinase inhibitors? We offer several different strategies with >380 kinases to choose from.
Want to screen your cell/tissue lysates against > 2000 antibodies? Try our antibody mcroarray services and kits for as little as 25¢ per antibody.
Looking for a cost-effective strategy for biomarker discovery and validation? Try our antibody microarray and custom multi-immunoblotting services.
Want to screen cells/tissues for altered protein expression and phosphorylation? Our antibody microarray services track over 750 signalling proteins.
Need to rapidly characterize and validate a potential biomarker protein or antibody? Try our custom lysate microarray and nitrocellulose array services.
Need to evaluate hundreds of your tissue lysates or biofluids for biomarker validation? Try our custom printed reverse lysate microarray services.
Need to inexpensively and rapidly validate gene or protein microarray data? Try our custom Kinetworks™ multi-immunoblotting services.
Want to accurately quantify protein phosphorylation in your cell or tissue samples? Select from >950 phosphosite-specific antibodies with our immunoblotting services.
Want to accurately quantify kinases and other proteins in your cell and tissue lysates? Try our custom Kinetworks™ multi-immunoblotting services for US$36 per target.
Want to compare your Kinexus proteomics data with thousands of other studies? Query our on-line KiNET data-bases with full open-free access.
Did you know that Kinexus offers over 1400 antibody and 1600 peptide products? Check out www.kinexusproducts.ca for antibodies, peptides and lysates.
Need mg quantities of custom rabbit polyclonal antibodies produced? Try our Custom Recombinant Protein Production Services.
Need mg quantities of synthetic peptides with special modifications? Try our custom multi-peptide and SPOT peptide synthesis services.
Need to identify optimal peptide substrates or perform epitope mapping? Try our custom SPOT peptide array production services.
Need help with presentation of proteomics data from Kinexus or pathway mapping? Try our custom graphics services and KiNetscape mapping services.
